description:
PokeMax is mad fast. Dad`s face doesn`t support multitouch. The backpacking hobo and the corporate swine are incompatible. Stampson the golden stamp wants in on a ramen run.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danzen, Bakusokussu / Keitai Ojako: Smafo ni Kaeru / Backpacker to Shinkansen de Aiseki / Raitan to Magma no Junjou Otoko Tabi: Kin`in Hen
Totally Fast as Hell, Dude / Cell Phone Family: Switching to a Smartphone / On the Bullet Train with a Backpacker / Gold Lightan and Magma`s Sentimental Journey: Gold Stamp
断然, 爆速っす / ケータイ親子 スマホに変える / バックパッカーと新幹線で相席 / ライタンとマグマの純情男旅 金印編
